name: Pacman Racing
description:
This game, made by the dev Tanplay, was an entry into the The Evolution Game Jam. It is an infinite runner/racing game where you control a pac-man style car and attempt to avoid the spikes in order to get a new high score. YOU CAN SEE THE INSTRUCTIONS IN THE "ABOUT" SECTION. Please note I am new to game dev as usual, and have fun! Controls:

W/S or the Arrow Keys to move up and down the lane.

P to Pause the game.

Avoid the spikes at all costs!
